solution_line_template: First, figure out how many additional miles Jackson is running after four weeks: {num_weeks} weeks * {extra_mile_per_week} extra mile/week = <<{num_weeks}*{extra_mile_per_week}={additional_miles}>>{additional_miles} extra miles

Then add the {additional_miles} extra miles to the {initial_miles_per_day} miles he initially ran: {additional_miles} miles + {initial_miles_per_day} miles = <<{additional_miles}+{initial_miles_per_day}={final_miles_per_day}>>{final_miles_per_day} miles
